DOC.brief_summary: This is a phase 2 study that will consist of 4 visits over a 5 week period. Drug will be evaluated using the conjunctival allergen challenge model of allergic conjunctivitis.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of the Safety and Efficacy of Ketotifen 4.0% Patch as Compared to Placebo Patch, Olopatadine 0.2% Ophthalmic Solution, and Artificial Tears in the Conjunctival Allergen Challenge (CAC) Model of Acute Allergic Conjunctivitis
DOC.criteria: 18 years of age of either sex and any race positive history of ocular allergies and a positive skin test reaction to cat hair, cat dander, dog dander, grasses, ragweed, trees, dust mites, and/or cockroaches within the past 24 months able and willing to avoid all disallowed medication for the washout period and during the study active ocular infection or skin condition ocular surgery within the past 3 months pregnancy or nursing
